page.title: 08HEALTH IN WENHAM AND RAYDON
page.content: The Old Rectory at Raydon has been a Nursing Home for some years.It cares mostly for geriatric cases in pleasant grounds and is now known as Raydon House Nursing Home.Staff come from neighbouring villages. Meals on Wheels are delivered where necessary to elderly or infirm people by members of the W.R.V.S.Food is cooked and delivered from Capel St.Mary Primary School three days a week during term time and twice weekly during school holidays when frozen meals are heated at East Bergholt Primary school and delivered by a rota of W.R.V.S members. Residents of Great Wenham use the G.P. services of Capel St.Mary Surgery.Those from Raydon the health centre at Hadleigh.A dentist is available in Capel St.Mary otherwise residents must travel to Ipswich or Hadleigh.
